column4: anyone else? why are .svg icons jaggy when sized? (yes they are svg)

xmms is old and unsupported and GUI. xmms2 is a client/server-model replacement. audacious is a completely unconnected (except that they look and work similarly) other media player that we tend to recommend for ex-xmms users.
airtonix  aaaah the other way around :) i remember using xmms a few years ago
